schema.description: Statistics of VPLS ping and trace tests.

mac-ping-results.description: List of VPLS MAC ping test result.

mac-ping-result.description: Statistics of VPLS MAC ping test results.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

replier-pe-addr.description: Reply PE address in a received response packet.

probes.description: List of ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of get the response result of a single packet in an VPLS MAC ping test.

sequence.description: Serial number of a received response packet.

replier.description: Reply address in a received response packet.

data-bytes.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

result-type.description: Result of packet sending, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

vsi-ping-results.description: List of VPLS VSI ping test results.

vsi-ping-result.description: Statistics of VPLS VSI ping test result.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

probes.description: List of VPLS VSI ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of VPLS VSI ping result of a single packet in a test.

sequence.description: Serial number of a test packet received.

replier.description: Reply address in a received response packet.

data-bytes.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

result-type.description: Result type of sent packet, which is either success or timeout.

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.
